Package cosc202.andie

package cosc202.andie
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    cosc202.andie.draw
     
    cosc202.andie.settings
     
  • Class
    Description
    Andie
    Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
    AndieConvolveOp
    This class is a re-implementation of the existing ConvolveOp class.
    AndieFileChooser
    A safer version of JFileChooser, asking the user whether they would like to overwrite their chosen filename if it already exists, or save changes to the current file before opening another file.
    BrightnessContrastAdjustment
    ImageOperation to adjust the brightness/contrast levels of an image.
    ColourActions
    Actions provided by the Colour menu.
    ConvertToGrey
    ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.
    CropImage
    ImageOperation to crop an image.
    EditableImage
    An image with a set of operations applied to it.
    EditActions
    Actions provided by the Edit menu.
    EmbossFilter
    ImageOperation to apply an Emboss effect to an image.
    FileActions
    Actions provided by the File menu.
    FilterActions
    Actions provided by the Filter menu.
    FlipImage
    ImageOperation to flip an image.
    GaussianBlurFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Gaussian Blur filter
    ImageAction
    Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
    ImageOperation
    Interface for operations to be applied to images.
    ImagePanel
    UI display element for EditableImages.
    Language
    A static class that manages translations inside of ANDIE.
    MacroDialog
    Creates a non-modal dialog that contains all of the macro-related actions.
    MeanFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Mean (simple blur) filter.
    MedianFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Median filter.
    Preferences
    A static class that manages access to the config.properties file, handling both retrieval and storing of data.
    ResizeImage
    ImageOperation to resize an image.
    RotateImage
    ImageOperation to rotate an image.
    SharpenFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Sharpen filter.
    SobelFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Sobel filter to an image.
    Toolbar
    A toolbar containing essential/common actions.
    TransformActions
    Actions provided by the Transform menu.
    UserInput
    An abstract class that allows for consistent user input methods, using JSlider and JSpinner.
    UserMessage
    Create a pop up box with showWarning() to notify the user when an error has occurred, instead of crashing with no explanation.
    ViewActions
    Actions provided by the View menu.
